text: Ljupco Andonovskiblic.rs Ljupčo Andonovski novi direktor makedonske obaveštajne uprave 26. 05. 2015 Retrieved 28.05.2015 (Serbian) was the tenth Director of the Administration for Security and Counterintelligence (UBK) of Macedonia. ==Career== Andonovski was appointed as the Director of UBK in 2015 by Prime Minister Nikola Gruevski. ==See also== * Law enforcement in the Republic of Macedonia ==References== Category:Living people Category:Macedonian politicians Category:People from Veles, North Macedonia Category:1964 births
title: Ljupco Andonovski
